sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Defines a stateless REST API with CRUD operations, auth, and integrations, optimized for reliability and latency.

sections.title: Architecture
sections.content: Node.js + Express, Postgres/Mongo, API gateway, OIDC, OTel tracing, horizontal scaling.

sections.title: Interfaces
sections.content: GET /v1/resources?page&limit, POST /v1/resources (idempotent), GET /v1/resources/{id}, PATCH, DELETE; error model {code,message,details}.

sections.title: Data Retention & Privacy
sections.content: PII minimization, encryption at rest/in transit, 13-month retention, DSRs supported, audit logs 90 days.

sections.title: Observability & SRE
sections.content: Structured logs, OTel traces, RED metrics dashboards; alerts: p95>250ms warn, p95>400ms critical; error rate >0.5%.

sections.title: Failure Modes & Resilience
sections.content: Timeouts, retries with backoff, circuit breaker, bulkheads, graceful shutdown.

sections.title: Security
sections.content: OIDC, JWT validation, RBAC, input validation, OWASP checks, secret management.
